title: Oleg Nikolayev (footballer)
text:
Oleg Vladimirovich Nikolayev (; born 21 May 1998) is a Russian <a href="association%20football">football</a> player who plays for <a href="FC%20Rotor%20Volgograd">FC Rotor Volgograd</a>.
Club career.
He made his debut in the <a href="Russian%20Professional%20Football%20League">Russian Professional Football League</a> for <a href="FC%20Rotor%20Volgograd">FC Rotor Volgograd</a> on 28 July 2016 in a game against <a href="FC%20Mashuk-KMV%20Pyatigorsk">FC Mashuk-KMV Pyatigorsk</a>.
He made his <a href="Russian%20Football%20National%20League">Russian Football National League</a> debut for Rotor on 8 July 2017 in a game against <a href="FC%20Khimki">FC Khimki</a>.
He made his <a href="Russian%20Premier%20League">Russian Premier League</a> debut for <a href="FC%20Rotor%20Volgograd">FC Rotor Volgograd</a> on 11 August 2020 in a game against <a href="FC%20Zenit%20Saint%20Petersburg">FC Zenit Saint Petersburg</a>.
On 19 January 2021, he joined <a href="FC%20Volgar%20Astrakhan">FC Volgar Astrakhan</a> on loan until the end of the 2020–21 season.
